author: glennm
msg: Updated the copy and merge task docs to include the includeEmptyDirs

author: glennm
msg: Added an includeEmptyDirs attribute to Copy and Move tasks.  The default
action is to include empty directories in any copy and move action.  It makes
a lot more sense for Move, and seems reasonable for Copy.
Fixed up Move to correctly remove the original directories rather than leave

author: bodewig
msg: New optional task for the SCC system Perforce.

author: bodewig
msg: (Re)enable support for multiple CVS modules in a single cvs task.
